reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater soft, elegant, and of excellent quality.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Big girls, fit is good, look is awesome!
items.body: Elegant but also dressy casual. I wore this wrap sweater for Thanksgiving with boot cut jeans and a pair of pumps. I received compliments on the look, color, fit! Even thinner folk wanted to know where they could purchase one. I don’t normally wear white, cream, beige, or Winter white after Labor Day (summer), but something about this waist length sweater kept my attention. It fits true to size but the material has a “lot” of give to adjust the cris-cross in the front, if you want to. Read more
items.author: Arlene

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft & Warm
items.body: This sweater is very soft and warm. The quality is nice. It fits true to size for a loose fit. I would get a smaller size if you’re looking for more form fitting. I bought a size small. I’m 5’5 and weigh 129 lbs for reference. Read more
items.author: Melissa Anders

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars So Cozy and Flattering, I Want Another One
items.body: The wrap design of this sweater is what first caught my eye online, and it’s even more unique and pretty in person. I was so happy when I tried it on! The fit is completely true to size and genuinely flattering. Plus, it’s just as soft and cozy as it looks in the pictures, which was a huge relief. The fabric is quite thick, so I know this will be a sweater I save for colder weather. That’s not a huge downside, just something to be aware of if you live in a warmer climate. The only other thing to note is the color which was listed as apricot, but it's really more of a cream. It’s still a lovely color that will be easy to pair with jeans or leggings, just not exactly what the description led me to believe. I absolutely love this quality sweater and can already tell I’ll be living in it all fall and winter. I'm already hoping they decide to make more colors because I would definitely buy a second one but it's a bit spendy so I'll be watching for it to go on sale. --- For anyone interested, the exact product I purchased was listed as: BEYINCUTE Women’s Casual V Neck Wrap Sweaters Elegant Long Sleeve Loose Fit Drop Shoulder Knitted Pullover Sweater Jumper Top (XX-Large, Apricot) The ASIN for the version I received was: B0FLP2GNQX Read more
items.author: Sam Fisher

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful!
items.body: This is a beautiful sweater and is true to size. It is very flattering and as soft as it looks in the picture. It is not lightweight so I will need to wait for cooler weather to wear. I would consider it a cream color rather than apricot as described. It took a couple of weeks to arrive, so I almost deducted a star. However, I don't need it right now it really does deserve 5 stars. I hope they come out with more colors. Read more
items.author: James B.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very soft and warm
items.body: Super soft wool, very comfortable and very warm but definitely need to wear a long sleeve shirt underneath to be warm because the cross over fabric is open to your skin. I bought the size I normally wear and it’s baggy, could have ordered a size down for a more form fitting look. Read more
items.author: Amazon Queen

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent quality
items.body: Very good quality! Soft but keeps its shape. It’s a good choice for cold days. I’m petite (5’0”)- and my belly button still shows. Nice for layering. Read more
items.author: Jennifer OlsonSmith

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Runs large.
items.body: It was very cute but too big for me. I recommend sizing down. Read more
items.author: Louise Salas

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve Off Shoulder is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve Off Shoulder is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Apricot. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
